mapper.select:
SELECT A.*,CASE WHEN B.KKSL IS NOT NULL THEN B.KKSL ELSE 0 END KKSL FROM ( SELECT A.F_DEVID,C.F_TYPE,C.F_MARK,C.F_INSTADDR,A.F_DEPT WDID,B.F_NAME WDNAME,D.F_NAME ZHNAME,Z.F_NAME INSTSTYLE,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('DCAR') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) A1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) B1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('AKEY') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) C1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('BTRA','TRAN') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) D1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('BTRA','TRAN') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) D2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('AATF','NAAT') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) E1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) E2, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) E3, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) E4, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) E5, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) E6,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ASTS','AMSG','ALIN','ATEL','ANOC') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F0, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ASTS') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('AMSG') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F2, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ALIN') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F3, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ATEL') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F4, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ANOC') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F5,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) G1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) G2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) H1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) H2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) I1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) I2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) J1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) J2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) K1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) K2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) L1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) L2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) M1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) M2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) N1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('LOST') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) O1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) P1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) Q1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) Q2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) R1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) R2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) S1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) S2
FROM t_tj2trans A,t_branch B,t_branch D,t_dev C LEFT OUTER JOIN t_codes Z ON Z.F_CATID='C5' AND C.F_INSTSTYLE=Z.F_ID
A.F_DATE >= #{fDateStart} AND A.F_DATE <= #{fDateEnd}
AND B.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND A.F_DEPT=B.F_ID AND A.F_FLAG='00' AND A.F_DEVID=C.F_ID AND B.F_DEPT=D.F_ID
AND A.F_DEVID=#{fDevid}
AND C.F_TYPE=#{fType}
GROUP BY A.F_DEVID,C.F_TYPE,C.F_MARK,C.F_INSTADDR,A.F_DEPT,B.F_NAME,D.F_NAME,Z.F_NAME ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_DEVID != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) KKSL,A.F_DEVID FROM t_discard A,t_branch B
A.F_DATE >= #{fDateStart} AND A.F_DATE <= #{fDateEnd}
AND B.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND A.F_DEPT=B.F_ID
AND A.F_DEVID=#{fDevid}
GROUP BY A.F_DEVID) B ON A.F_DEVID=B.F_DEVID ORDER BY A.WDID,A.F_DEVID

SELECT A.*,CASE WHEN B.KKSL IS NOT NULL THEN B.KKSL ELSE 0 END KKSL FROM ( SELECT
B.F_ID JGID,B.F_NAME JGNAME,
C.F_ID JGID,C.F_NAME JGNAME,
E.F_ID JGID,E.F_NAME JGNAME,
F.F_ID JGID,F.F_NAME JGNAME,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('DCAR') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) A1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) B1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('AKEY') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) C1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('BTRA','TRAN') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) D1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('BTRA','TRAN') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) D2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('AATF','NAAT') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) E1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) E2, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) E3, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) E4, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) E5, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) E6,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ASTS','AMSG','ALIN','ATEL','ANOC') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F0, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ASTS') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('AMSG') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F2, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ALIN') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F3, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ATEL') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F4, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('ANOC') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) F5,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) G1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) G2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) H1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) H2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) I1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) I2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) J1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) J2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) K1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) K2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) L1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) L2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) M1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) M2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) N1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('LOST') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) O1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) P1,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) Q1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) Q2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) R1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) R2,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_N ELSE 0 END) S1, SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_TRCD IN ('') THEN A.F_SUC_M ELSE 0 END) S2
FROM t_tj2trans A,t_branch B,t_dev D
,t_branch C
,t_branch C ,t_branch E
,t_branch C ,t_branch E ,t_branch F
A.F_DEVID=D.F_ID AND A.F_DEPT = B.F_ID
AND A.F_DATE >= #{fDateStart} AND A.F_DATE <= #{fDateEnd}
AND B.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND B.F_DEPT = C.F_ID AND C.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND B.F_DEPT = C.F_ID AND C.F_DEPT = E.F_ID AND E.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND B.F_DEPT = C.F_ID AND C.F_DEPT = E.F_ID AND E.F_DEPT = F.F_ID AND F.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND D.F_TYPE=#{fType}
GROUP BY
B.F_ID,B.F_NAME
C.F_ID,C.F_NAME
E.F_ID,E.F_NAME
F.F_ID,F.F_NAME
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT
B.F_ID JGID,B.F_NAME JGNAME,
C.F_ID JGID,C.F_NAME JGNAME,
E.F_ID JGID,E.F_NAME JGNAME,
F.F_ID JGID,F.F_NAME JGNAME,
SUM(CASE WHEN A.F_DEVID!='' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) KKSL FROM t_discard A,t_branch B
,t_branch C
,t_branch C ,t_branch E
,t_branch C ,t_branch E ,t_branch F
A.F_DEPT = B.F_ID
AND A.F_DATE >= #{fDateStart} AND A.F_DATE <= #{fDateEnd}
AND B.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND B.F_DEPT = C.F_ID AND C.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND B.F_DEPT = C.F_ID AND C.F_DEPT = E.F_ID AND E.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
AND B.F_DEPT = C.F_ID AND C.F_DEPT = E.F_ID AND E.F_DEPT = F.F_ID AND F.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{deptid},'%')
GROUP BY
B.F_ID,B.F_NAME
C.F_ID,C.F_NAME
E.F_ID,E.F_NAME
F.F_ID,F.F_NAME
) B ON A.JGID=B.JGID ORDER BY A.JGID

SELECT A.F_DATE, A.F_TIME, A.F_DEVID, A.F_DEPT, B.F_NAME WDNAME, C.F_NAME ZHNAME, D.F_NAME FHNAME, Z.F_NAME TRCD, A.F_ACNO, A.F_ACNO2, A.F_CDNO, A.F_IDNO, A.F_USRNO, concat('',A.F_TRAM) F_TRAM, A.F_DEVLS, A.F_RCPTNO, A.F_CHKNO, A.F_ACCTNO, A.F_MEMO, A.F_TERM, A.F_OPERATOR, CASE WHEN A.F_ACCTOFF='1' THEN '是' WHEN A.F_ACCTOFF='0' THEN '否' END AS F_ACCTOFF, CASE WHEN Y.F_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN Y.F_NAME ELSE A.F_RETNO END AS F_RETNO, CONVERT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(A.F_DATE,1,4),'-',SUBSTR(A.F_DATE,5,2),'-',SUBSTR(A.F_DATE,7,2)),CHAR) F_DATE1, CONVERT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(A.F_TIME,1,2),':',SUBSTR(A.F_TIME,3,2)),CHAR) F_TIME1 FROM (SELECT * FROM t_mtrans UNION SELECT * FROM ht_mtrans) A LEFT OUTER JOIN t_codes Z ON Z.F_CATID='JY' AND A.F_TRCD=Z.F_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN t_codes Y ON Y.F_CATID='RS' AND A.F_RETNO=Y.F_ID, t_branch B, t_branch C, t_branch D
B.F_DEPTID LIKE concat(#{fDeptid},"%")
AND A.F_DEPT=B.F_ID AND B.F_DEPT=C.F_ID AND C.F_DEPT=D.F_ID
ORDER BY A.F_DATE DESC,A.F_TIME DESC LIMIT 50
mapper.insert: insert into t_mtrans (F_DATE, F_TIME, F_DEVID, F_DEPT, F_TRCD, F_ACNO, F_ACNO2, F_CDNO, F_IDNO, F_USRNO, F_TRAM, F_FEE, F_DEVLS, F_RCPTNO, F_CHKNO, F_ACCTNO, F_ACCTOFF, F_RETNO, F_STCD, F_FLAG1, F_FLAG2, F_FLAG3, F_FLAG4, F_PAD1, F_MEMO, F_TIME1, F_TIME2, F_VIDEOID, F_PERMIT, F_INFO, f_date1, F_DATE2, F_PRDTYPE, F_PERIOD, F_OPERATOR, f_file1, f_file2, f_file3, f_flag, F_PZFLAG, F_USRNAME, F_PHONE, F_CDTYPE, F_FMTYPE, F_TERM, F_PRINT) values (#{fDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fDevid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fDept,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fTrcd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fAcno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fAcno2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fCdno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fIdno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fUsrno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fTram,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fDevls,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fRcptno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fChkno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fAcctno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fAcctoff,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fRetno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fStcd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fFlag1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fFlag2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fFlag3,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fFlag4,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fPad1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fMemo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fVideoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDate2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPrdtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFile3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPzflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fUsrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCdtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFmtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fPrint,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_mtrans
F_DATE,
F_TIME,
F_DEVID,
F_DEPT,
F_TRCD,
F_ACNO,
F_ACNO2,
F_CDNO,
F_IDNO,
F_USRNO,
F_TRAM,
F_FEE,
F_DEVLS,
F_RCPTNO,
F_CHKNO,
F_ACCTNO,
F_ACCTOFF,
F_RETNO,
F_STCD,
F_FLAG1,
F_FLAG2,
F_FLAG3,
F_FLAG4,
F_PAD1,
F_MEMO,
F_TIME1,
F_TIME2,
F_VIDEOID,
F_PERMIT,
F_INFO,
f_date1,
F_DATE2,
F_PRDTYPE,
F_PERIOD,
F_OPERATOR,
f_file1,
f_file2,
f_file3,
f_flag,
F_PZFLAG,
F_USRNAME,
F_PHONE,
F_CDTYPE,
F_FMTYPE,
F_TERM,
F_PRINT,
#{fDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fDevid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fDept,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fTrcd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fAcno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fAcno2,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fCdno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fIdno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fUsrno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fTram,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fDevls,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fRcptno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fChkno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fAcctno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fAcctoff,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fRetno,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fStcd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fFlag1,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fFlag2,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fFlag3,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fFlag4,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fPad1,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fMemo,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{fTime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fTime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fVideoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fDate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fDate2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPrdtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fFile1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fFile2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fFile3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPzflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fUsrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fCdtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fFmtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fPrint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
